title: Don't Go to theater to watch this movie at all
review: after watching that the movie got 8.7 on IMDb i thought it should be a great movie with lots of visual effects and all that stuff which i like to see on big theater screen but what i left with was hours of yawning and looking at other people faces and seeing people making out in the back of theater. if you are a true marvel universe fan than please don't waste your time on this crap. There were some scenes in the movie where even a person like me said 'oh come on really' and i didn't used these lines since twilight series. If you know the history of mandarin you will going to be very much disappointed in this movie.IMDb really disappointed me with this one.
